about_the_game:
QUSHA is a teaching program in the -UE5 Full Process Course for Indie Game Creators by VaMP He and MOTZIFY. It’s a course project, not a full-fledged commercial release. We welcome you to play and provide feedback!



Through continuous cultivation and upgrades, players enhance their spell abilities, enabling to remain fearless even when surrounded by demons. By combining various spells, increase strength and slay monsters on journey.


Vast Arsenal of Spells for Unleashing Demonic Annihilation


QUSHA boasts an extensive spell system, immersing players in a journey of magical mastery. As you progress, you'll refine your spellcasting prowess, becoming adept in wielding a diverse array of talismans and spells to effectively combat the forces of evil. Through continuous upgrades and demon slaying, you'll ascend to the pinnacle of power, becoming the ultimate vanquisher of all things demonic.



Experience the thrill of slaying all kinds of demons


Powered by the UE5 engine, QUSHA can host a large number of demons. With every swing of your blade and every spell cast, you'll revel in the visceral thrill of decimating hordes of malevolent creatures.


Are you interested in game development? Join us and learn to make games together!

QUSHA is a teaching program in the -UE5 Full Process Course for Indie Game Creators by VaMP He and MOTZIFY. Due to its nature as a course project, the game is smaller in scope. We encourage you to try it out and share your thoughts!
In this course, we will teach you to make QUSHA step by step: starting from software download, we will take you to unlock the development and release of indie games. There is also a large developer support fund,which can make your game stand out!
Are you interested in game development? Come and scan the code to to learn more!

short_description: QUSHA is a Chinese-style roguelike survivor game where you take on the role of a novice Daoist disciple in a world overrun by demons. As you progress through the game, you'll master a variety of talismans and Daoist techniques, unlocking powerful spells to combat evil forces and defend the peace.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
